product_name: Hammer Nutrition Endurolytes Fizz Tube - 13 Servings
long_description: Hammer Nutrition Endurolytes(R) Fizz tube contains 13 convenient tablets that dissolve quickly in your water to help you replenish electrolytes and stay hydrated. 1 Endurolytes Fizz tablet is equivalent to approximately 2 Hammer Nutrition Endurolytes capsules (sold separately); tablets easily break in half so you can choose the dosage. Tablets contains electrolytes sodium and potassium to help accelerate your rehydration. Gluten free and vegan; contain no refined sugars or artificial sweeteners. Only 10 calories per serving. Add 1 - 2 Endurolytes Fizz tablets per bottle of water; wait for tablets to dissolve completely and consume as needed to maintain proper hydration and electrolyte levels. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Hammer Nutrition Endurolytes(R) Fizz tube contains 13 convenient tablets that dissolve quickly in your water to help you replenish electrolytes and stay hydrated.
